item.title: Links
item.description: openSUSE [Greybeard] https://github.com/ProjectGreybeard/ [Felis] https://build.opensuse.org/project/show/home:mauriziogalli:felis DevOps [Salt intro] https://docs.saltproject.io/en/getstarted/system/index.html [Systemd Homed] https://systemd.io/HOME_DIRECTORY/ [IT-tools] https://github.com/CorentinTh/it-tools [Self-hosted apps list] https://github.com/awesome-selfhosted/awesome-selfhosted [Dev tools list] https://github.com/ripienaar/free-for-dev [Github Actions quickstart] https://docs.github.com/en/actions/quickstart [Bitnami containers] https://github.com/bitnami/containers [Nix disko] https://github.com/nix-community/disko [Python learning path] https://roadmap.sh/python Kubernetes [Configmap reload] https://github.com/jimmidyson/configmap-reload [90 days of devops] https://github.com/MichaelCade/90DaysOfDevOps/tree/main/2023 Monitoring [My uptime robot status page] https://stats.uptimerobot.com/qqOq4iLR4A [Uptime-kuma] https://github.com/louislam/uptime-kuma [Prometheus operator for k8s] https://github.com/prometheus-community/helm-charts/blob/main/charts/kube-prometheus-stack/Chart.yaml [Kubeshark] https://github.com/kubeshark/kubeshark [Prometheus additional scraping options] https://fabianlee.org/2022/07/08/prometheus-monitoring-services-using-additional-scrape-config-for-prometheus-operator/ Automation, CI/CD [GitlabCI local testing] https://github.
